page.title: 08School sporting activities
page.content: Our school football team has had a very successful season. We won the league as we did last year. We lost one game in the league, but were knocked out of the Sam David Cup by the eventual winners in the semi-final. We were presented with our medals at Grays Athletic F.C. after beating a rest of the league team 1-0. We won a five a side tournament at Orset Village Fair. The school netball team played many friendly games during the season. In athletics we won the competion for small schools. We were second in the field events. Richard Illing won the high jump, Daniel Murray won the ball throwing and Lucy Saunders was 2nd in the long jump. The boys relay team was first. 18 children took part in a county dancing festival.
